group_1.textCenter: Thank you, thank you very much...
(People who came after reading my review@and announcement...)
(I feel like there were pretty much zero...)

group_1.textLeft: ...I think that's our last customer.
And that concludes the event!

group_1.textRight: Phew...it's finally over, I'm exhausted.

group_1.textLeft: Senpai, weren't you practically slacking off@the whole time?

group_1.textRight: Oh, but for the beautiful Ria Ami,@merely being present is enough.
It's a great way to attract customers!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah, whatever you say.
Hey...what are you doing in the corner@like that, Tsumugi?

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry...customer?@I'll take your order right away...

group_1.textLeft: No, what are you talking about?@It's closing time.

group_1.textRight: ...I didn't realize...

group_1.textLeft: You don't have to push yourself so hard...
Come on, Tsumugi, let's replenish@your energy.
Here you go, rice omelet!

group_1.textRight: Oh...om...om...
[chara:302401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]...Delicious!!@Manaka's rice omelet is as delicious as always!
Ah...

group_1.textLeft: Hm, want another one?@We still have the ingredients.

group_1.textRight: I can't face you!!

group_1.textLeft: ...Huh?

group_1.textRight: You...
If you're going to run away, at least go farther.

group_1.textLeft: R-Ria-senpai!@How did you...

group_1.textRight: Even from the door of the restaurant,@I could still see your back!

group_1.textLeft: Because...I've been working all day without@eating snacks, so I just don't have the energy...

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*...@So why did you run out?

group_1.textLeft: I was so confident in planning the event,@but no one showed up...
Even the customers who finally showed up@were only there because of you, Ria-senpai...
In the end, I'm just an average junior high@student with no good qualities, I just eat stuff.
That's what I realized...

group_1.textRight: .........[wait:1.0][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]You, just what are you saying?
You have qualities you can be proud of.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, I do...?

group_1.textRight: You love to eat, and you have a passion for eating.
What's wrong with that? Isn't that enough?

group_1.textLeft: Well...@I'm not able to help Manaka...

group_1.textRight: Listen up!@Being a truly average person means...
...no matter how hard you try, you can NEVER@escape from your fate of being "average"...!
THAT'S the kind of person you're referring to!!

group_1.textLeft: Eh, u-um...Senpai...?

group_1.textRight: If I were you, I wouldn't let a single failure@bring me down!
I would do whatever it takes to get my wish!

group_1.textLeft: Whatever...it takes...

group_1.textRight: ...Pardon me, I got carried away.
Tsumugi, I'll be heading back to the restaurant.
Return home before it gets too dark out.

group_1.textLeft: (I know...@I can't stay depressed!)
Kyubey!

group_1.textRight: Hello, Tsumugi, did you call for me?
Perhaps...you've called me because you're@ready to form a contract with me?

group_1.textLeft: That's right, Kyubey, I'll form a contract@with you, so grant my wish...!
